title: Mimosa Blossom Dream Cream (Face & Body) By the Super Salve Co. 100% Natural Herbal Skin Care
features: Contains moisturizing and nourishing ingredients including: purified mountain rain water, olive oil, sweet almond oil, apricot oil, grape seed oil, shea butter, avocado oil, coconut oil, mimosa flower wax, beeswax, Jojoba oil and Rose hip seed oil.
Scented with flower essences and pure essential oils of ylang ylang and sweet orange and no synthetic fragrance.
Works for all skin types to re-hydrate, rejuvenate and improve overall complexion.
Mimosa Blossom Dream Cream was created using certified organic herbs, pure essential oils and contain no alcohol or dyes.
